l:dependency.name: Build History Metrics plugin
l:dependency.l:description: Provides build metrics that encompass the history of all the runs

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Math
l:dependency.l:description: The Apache Commons Math project is a library of lightweight, self-contained mathematics and statistics components addressing the most common practical problems not immediately available in the Java programming language or commons-lang.

l:dependency.name: Guava: Google Core Libraries for Java
l:dependency.l:description:
Guava is a suite of core and expanded libraries that include utility classes, google's collections, io classes, and much much more.
Guava has only one code dependency - javax.annotation, per the JSR-305 spec.
